thread.title: great stay!
thread.title_full: great stay! - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Scott M
title: great stay!
text: The hotel had many tourists from all over the globe. Finland, Austria, Japan, Germany, etc etc I was there for the week for working downtown. The bar St George Tavern was great for happy hour with access to the hotel, they also serve the "free" breakfast off a menu which is better than most Express hotels, and service was good. Also has the Tipsy Shanghai chinese restaurant for a change of pace. 2 block walk to WTC. Also, Morton's steakhouse 2 blocks away.
